CustomField.description: Will define in MILESTONES_APEX how the invoices will be inserted reg. Invoice Date. User enters value on LWC INSERT_MILESTONES_LWC for ProjectType__c = 'Time & Materials', 'Managed Services' or 'Maintenance'. Start of Project = Milestone Date is ProjectStartDateTrig__c - 10. Beginning of Month = Milestones Dates are the 2. of each month Mid-Month = Milestones Dates are on the 16th of each month.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please select when the invoicing should happen. Must be filled for project type "Time & Materials", "Managed Services" and "Maintenance". "Beginning of Month" means the previous month (service period) will be invoiced at the start of the following month.
CustomField.label: Invoicing At
